summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FanPass ticket marketplace. Fixed critical React Hooks error in EventDetailsPage.jsx. Backend API 100% passing (14/14 tests). Frontend all pages loading correctly with proper venue maps.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: EventDetailsPage.jsx had useEffect hook called after early return statements (lines 144-152). React hooks must be called unconditionally in the same order. Moved useEffect for document.title to line 108 (after the fetch useEffect and before any early returns).
seed_data_creation: Existing seed data used - 30 events (concerts + matches) with tickets
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. React Hook error in EventDetailsPage.jsx was fixed by moving the useEffect for document.title before the early return statements. Backend sitemap.xml and robots.txt endpoints working correctly. Concert venue maps show STAGE layout, football venue maps show pitch layout with categories.
passed_tests: Sitemap.xml returns valid XML with all pages
Robots.txt returns valid content with proper directives
Match event details (England vs Uruguay - event_ab4a8ddedfc0)
Homepage loads correctly with featured events
About page loads with proper content
Concert venue map shows STAGE layout
Football venue map shows pitch layout with VIP, CAT1, CAT2, CAT3 sections

bug_fixed.issue: React Hook 'useEffect' was called conditionally after early return statements
bug_fixed.root_cause: The useEffect for setting document.title was placed at line 164, after the loading check (line 144-150) and !event check (line 152), violating React's rules of hooks
bug_fixed.fix: Moved the useEffect to line 108, immediately after the fetch useEffect and before any early returns
bug_fixed.verification: ESLint now passes, no error overlay on any page
